name: strong
description: Bullet Protective Screens are the Most Durable Baseball L Screens on the market. The Bullet L Screen Jr is the ultimate solution for baseball and softball protection. For over 20 years, our Netting Installation and Sports Facility Design expertise has led to the highest quality baseball l screen on the market. You can rest assured that the players and coaches under the protection of the Bullet L Screen Jr will be safe from balls hit at high velocities. Our 1 ⅝” industrial-grade galvanized steel frame and #60 gauge nylon double-layered pillowcase netting make it extremely durable against any kind of force or weather. Built to withstand the constant abuse of a commercial training facility, high school, college, or organization, these screens are truly built to last. Match your team’s colors, reduce batted ball ricochet, and protect the life of your netting with heavy-duty foam and vinyl padding. Also, if you are needing a screen that is easy to move around, be sure to add our wheel kit that is perfect for both on and off the field. Order your Bullet L Screen Jr today with FREE & FAST DELIVERY. Bullet Protective Screens are the Most Durable Baseball L Screens on the market. warranty: Netting Warranty: Full Two (2) Year Warranty Netting Warranty: Full Two (2) Year Warranty
features: Frame Warranty: Full Five (5) Year Warranty
Netting Warranty: Full Two (2) Year Warranty
Pro Grade: 7’H x 5’W L Frame with Hip Guard Protector
Frame: Durable & Rust Resistant 14 Gauge Galvanized Steel Frame
Netting: Long-Lasting #60 UV Treated Nylon, Double Layer Pillowcase Net
Heavy Duty: 18 oz Vinyl & 1 ½” Impact Foam Padding
Optional Wheel Kit: 10” with Steel Plate Cover
Reversible "L" Shape: for Right & Left-Handed Pitchers
All-Weather Materials: Provides Protection from Outdoor Elements
Built Tough: For Training Facilities, Schools, & Organizations
Shipping Dimensions: Screen Box: 82”H x 16”W x 4”L (45 lbs) Pad Kit Box (Optional Wheels): 48”H x 12”W x 12” (10-25 lbs)
Pad Kit Box (Optional Wheels): 48”H x 12”W x 12” (10-25 lbs)
